players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Charlie was such a good person. We need to figure out who did this. Does anyone have any information that could help us identify the killer?"
Bob: "I agree with Alice, we need to find the killer. Based on my investigation last night, I believe Alice is the one who committed the crime."
Diana: "I'm sorry for the loss of Charlie. I didn't have any information last night that could help us identify the killer."
Bob: "I stand by my previous statement that Alice is the one who committed the crime based on my investigation last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
